tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_information (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    contact_details VARCHAR(100),
    drivers_license_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE rental_agreement_records (
    agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    rental_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer_information(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
 customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
 contact_number VARCHAR NOT NULL,
 license_number VARCHAR NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE rental_agreements (
 agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
 start_date DATE NOT NULL,
 end_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE rentals (
 rental_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 agreement_id INT REFERENCES rental_agreements(agreement_id),
 amount_due DECIMAL NOT NULL,
 payment_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE rental_agreements (
    agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    rental_date DATE NOT NULL,
    return_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rental_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agreement_id INT NOT NULL,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    rental_fee DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (agreement_id) REFERENCES rental_agreements(agreement_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES rental_items(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR,
	email VARCHAR,
	phone_number VARCHAR,
	drivers_license VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE rental_agreements (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT,
	vehicle_id INT,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	make VARCHAR,
	model VARCHAR,
	year INT,
	license_plate VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE rental_history (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT,
	vehicle_id INT,
	rental_date DATE,
	return_date DATE
);
